description:
Do you want to speak in public? Want to communicate and generate impact on your audience? Have you ever had to give a speech or share a project? ... If you want to learn tricks and simple techniques to master the art of public speaking and public speaking, do it in 13 steps with us.

Synopsis:

Participants will learn techniques for public speaking.
Discovering the power of verbal and nonverbal language.

Author:

Franco Soldi (Founder & CEO Captain YPD)

Goals:

  • Learning to generate excitement in your papers
  • Manage stage fright when speaking in public

Tips:

  • To emphasize the importance of physical presence and positive body language and the language paraverbal to impact and influence.
  • Always consider the consistency between what we say and how we say it.
  • Exit me.
